FlashCard.QUESTION: Which service is used to ensure availability during maintenance events?
FlashCard.ANSWER: Availability Set. Availability sets provide VM redundancy and availability. This configuration within a datacenter (Availability Zone) ensures that during either a planned or unplanned maintenance event, at least one vm is available and meets the 99.95% Azure SLA.
